Comment: A unique ID number for the transfer request
The ID number of the location that stock is to be transferred from.
The ID number of the location that stock is to be transferred to.
The date and time when the request was created.
The date and time that the request must be completed by.
The ID number of the staff member assigned to the request.
The status of the stock transfer. Will be one of:0 = New Request1 = Picking2 = In Transit3 = Complete
The ID number of the Stock Request Type (from STOCK_REQUESTTYPES).
The customer order number, if there is one.
The ID number for the narrative on this request.
